title: How to Prepare for a Large Workshop
content:
It can be stressful to prepare for a large workshop, there is just so much to think about!

For years, I've been using variations of this checklist to guide how I prepare for large workshops. It goes without saying that context is everything and that no two workshops are the same â€” some of these items might make sense in your situations, others might not, but it could still be useful to have a somewhat comprehensive view of the work that needs to take place to prepare for most workshops.
